sentences.en: Banana plug - compatible speaker terminals grace the amplifier outputs, facilitating the use of audiophile - quality speaker cables.
sentences.cn: 香蕉插头兼容的扬声器终端宽限期放大器输出, 促进利用高 保真 品质扬声器电缆.

sentences.en: Frank only buys the very best in stereo equipment. He is a true audiophile.
sentences.cn: 法兰克专买最顶级的音响配备. 他真是一位爱玩高级音响的人.

sentences.en: Her audiophile following is bound to feel the same way.
sentences.cn: 她的乐迷一定会有同样的想法.

sentences.en: In 1986, AIK founded HUGO Productions with a vision to produce Chinese music of audiophile recordings.
sentences.cn: 1986年, 易有伍秉著制作高保真音响中国音乐的愿景,成立了雨果制作有限公司.

sentences.en: The phil- in philately is the same as in Philadelphia, the city of brotherly love, or in audiophile a lover of high end stereo equipment.
sentences.cn: Philately单词中的phil-，同于“博爱城”费城Philadelphia中的Phi-，或者高端音响设备爱好者audiophile中的Phi-。

trans.tran_cn: 高保真音响爱好者，发烧友
trans.tran_en: a person who has a great interest in high-fidelity sound reproduction
